mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT N.NOTICE_TYPE, N.NOTICE_NO, N.NOTICE_TITLE, E.EMP_NAME, J.JOB_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME, N.CREATE_DATE, NVL(NN.NOTICE_ATT_CNT, 0) AS NOTICE_ATT_CNT, N.NOTICE_COUNT, NVL(RR.NOTICE_REPLY_CNT, 0) AS NOTICE_REPLY_CNT FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO, COUNT(*) AS NOTICE_REPLY_CNT FROM REPLY GROUP BY NOTICE_NO) RR, ( SELECT NOTICE_NO, COUNT(*) AS NOTICE_ATT_CNT FROM NOTICE_ATTACHMENT GROUP BY NOTICE_NO) NN, NOTICE N, EMPLOYEE E, JOB J, DEPARTMENT D, NOTICE_ATTACHMENT AT WHERE N.NOTICE_WRITER = E.EMP_NO AND E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE AND E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE AND N.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND N.NOTICE_NO = AT.NOTICE_NO(+) AND N.NOTICE_NO = RR.NOTICE_NO(+) AND N.NOTICE_NO = NN.NOTICE_NO(+) ORDER BY N.NOTICE_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, NOTICE_STATUS, NOTICE_COUNT, NOTICE_TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ empNo }, #{ noticeTitle }, #{ noticeContent }, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{ noticeType } )

INSERT INTO NOTICE_ATTACHMENT ( NOTICE_FILE_NO, NOTICE_ORIGIN_FILENAME, NOTICE_CHANGE_FILENAME, NOTICE_FILE_PATH, NOTICE_UPLOAD_DATE, NOTICE_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ originFileName }, #{ changeFileName }, #{ filePath }, SYSDATE, SEQ_NOTICE_NO.CURRVAL )
mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_NO, N.NOTICE_TITLE, N.CREATE_DATE, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMP_NO, D.DEPT_NAME, J.JOB_NAME, N.NOTICE_CONTENT, AT.NOTICE_ORIGIN_FILENAME, AT.NOTICE_CHANGE_FILENAME, AT.NOTICE_FILE_PATH, NVL(L.NOTICE_LIKE_CNT, 0) AS NOTICE_LIKE_CNT FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO, COUNT(NOTICE_NO) AS NOTICE_LIKE_CNT FROM NOTICE_LIKE GROUP BY NOTICE_NO) L, NOTICE N, EMPLOYEE E, DEPARTMENT D, JOB J, NOTICE_ATTACHMENT AT WHERE N.NOTICE_WRITER = E.EMP_NO AND E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE AND E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE AND N.NOTICE_NO = AT.NOTICE_NO(+) AND N.NOTICE_NO = L.NOTICE_NO(+) AND N.NOTICE_NO = #{ noticeNo }
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE_LIKE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{ noticeNo } AND EMP_NO = #{ empNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE_LIKE ( NOTICE_LIKE_NO, NOTICE_NO, EMP_NO, NOTICE_LIKE_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_LIKE.NEXTVAL, #{ noticeNo }, #{ empNo }, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_COUNT = NOTICE_COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{ noticeNo }
